item.title: [182] [GREAT NEWS] Switch 2 is the FASTEST selling console OF ALL TIME
item.description:
>The Nintendo Switch 2 might have just made history. According to a new report, it sold more consoles in 24 hours than any other console ever has. The hype before launch was already massive, but the actual numbers are even more surprising

>Just to understand how big that is — the PlayStation 4 held the 24-hour sales record before, with just over 1 million units sold. That’s less than half of what the Switch 2 may have sold in the same time. And when looking at total sales over two months, the record was about 4.5 million units, held by the PS5 and PS4. The Switch 2 could beat that number in just a few days.

The switch 2 managed to SELL over 3 MILLION units in only 24 hours, this not only puts it as the fastest selling console of ALL TIME but also makes nintendo's prediction of 30 million sales look low.
This blows the previous record out of the water, which was the PS4 which only managed to shift a paltry 1 million units in the same time frame.
Due to the switch 2 selling 3x faster than the PS4, it is wise to check in on your local snoys to make sure they are still alive. After their failed attempts to convince people the switch 2 is a flop by showing it still in stock, despite Nintendo explicitly saying they have produced significantly more stock than normal to combat scalpers and stock issues, the snoys continued with hourly switch 2 doom posts.
Not only were they proven to be retards, but also to be proven so wrong that they even lost the crown of best launch sales for a console!

Original filename: Switch Success.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

ATL: Chris Sale fanned a season-high 11 while allowing one run over seven innings in the Braves’ 7-1 victory over the Brewers on Monday
PHI: Brandon Marsh came off the bench to go 2-for-3 with the game-winning hit as the Phillies edged the Cubs 4-3 in 11 innings on Monday
PIT: Bryan Reynolds went 2-for-5 with a three-run triple on Monday, powering the Pirates to a 10-3 blowout victory over the Marlins
CIN: Jake Fraley went 3-for-4 with a homer Monday in the Reds’ 7-4 defeat of the Guardians

item.title: [259] The rioting intensifies
item.description:
Mass Looting Breaks Out as LA Riots Intensify
https://www.newsweek.com/mass-looting-breaks-out-la-riots-intensify-2082622

Los Angeles police have said they are receiving reports of looting from business owners as videos emerged on social media showing a mass of people running into stores whose frontages had been broken open.

"Business owners are reporting stores are being looted in the area of 6th St. and Broadway," Los Angeles Police Department's (LAPD) Central Division posted to X. "Officers are en route to the location to investigate." The area referred to is in Downtown L.A.

Police urged all businesses and residents "to report any vandalism, damage or looting to LAPD Central Division so that it can be documented by an official police report. Please photograph all vandalism and damage prior to clean up."

Why It Matters
Over the weekend, protests in Los Angeles against immigration enforcement escalated in some areas, with isolated incidents of violence and looting. In response, President Donald Trump announced the deployment of 2,000 National Guard troops to restore order, without California Governor Gavin Newsom's consent.

Immigration remains a central pillar of Trump's second-term agenda. The president has pledged sweeping crackdowns on border security, expanded deportation operations, and an end to federal benefits for undocumented immigrants.

In addition, the administration is invoking the wartime Alien Enemies Act of 1798 to broaden deportation authority—a move that has triggered fierce backlash and mounting legal challenges.

The demonstrations mark the most intense wave of public opposition to federal immigration enforcement since Trump returned to office in January.

YouTuber BillyJohnOh captured the chaotic looting of a Jordan sneaker store during a livestream. In another video posted online separately, looters can be seen raiding a gas station's convenience store.

Original filename: Los Angeles circa 2025.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 36] No Kadena thread during Pride Month? Let's change that! Kadena (ticket: KDA
item.description:
No Kadena thread during Pride Month?
Let's change that!

Kadena (ticket: KDA) is the most scalable Layer 1 with 20 (!) chains, these chains run Pact, the most secure smart contracts programming language.
In the very near future 20 EVM chains will be added to the network.
Kadena is the most inclusive crypto project, for example the CEO is trans.

More info and exchanges:
https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/kadena

Kadena ecosystem:
https://www.kadena.io/ecosystem

Welcome: Lolicons, Gays, Bi, T-babes (LGBT) and the other letters.

item.title: [278] /nrl/ - Rugby League General - Monday - Round 14 concludes
item.description:
King’s birthday edition

NRL
>GAME 1
Canterbury Bulldogs v Parramatta Eels
4:00pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
Accor Stadium, Homebush
1.42-2.89
>Adding to the rivalry between these clubs is Lachlan Galvin's choice to sign with the Bulldogs in preference to the team he supported as a youngster. The final match of Round 14 sees a traditional rivalry reignited as the ladder-leading Bulldogs host the struggling Eels at Accor Stadium on Monday afternoon. The Bulldogs had a bye in Round 13 and their last outing was a shock 8-44 loss to the Dolphins in Round 12. The Eels suffered a 10-18 defeat to the Panthers in Round 13, their third loss in five. Bulldogs' Captain Stephen Crichton, Max King, and Kurt Mann return from Origin duties/rest, providing a significant boost. Matt Burton's kicking game and direction will be vital. Daniel Suluka-Fifita also returns from concussion. For the Eels, Will Penisini is expected back from concussion. Mitchell Moses will steer the ship from halfback, with Junior Paulo and Ryan Matterson providing the attack. Isaiah Iongi is expected to continue at fullback. The Bulldogs have had the wood over the Eels in their last two meetings, winning 22-18 in Round 14, 2024, and 16-8 in Round 3 of the current 2025 season. However, the head-to-head record at Accor Stadium is evenly poised at 18 wins apiece.
Bulldogs 1-12 2.90
Bulldogs 13+ 2.35
Eels 1-12 4.00
Eels 13+ 8.25
Bulldogs -8.5 1.97 Eels +8.5 1.84

NSWRL
>GAME 1
Canterbury Bulldogs v Western Suburbs Magpies
1:40pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
Accor Stadium, Homebush
>Live coverage of Round 14 of the NSW Cup.

Original filename: King’s bday.jpg

item.title: [392] Trump quells insurrection in LA
item.description:
Trump orders National Guard to LA after clashes

https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c4gkyggekgyo

US President Donald Trump has ordered 2,000 National Guardsmen to Los Angeles to deal with unrest over raids on undocumented migrants.

Trump said the federal government would "step in and solve the problem", after the Californian city saw a second day of clashes between protesters and federal agents.

Tear gas was used to disperse crowds as residents of the predominantly Latino Paramount district clashed with Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents earlier in the day.

As many as 118 arrests were made in LA this week as a result of ICE operations, including 44 on Friday. California Governor Gavin Newsom has condemned the raids as "cruel".

Trump thanked the National Guard for a "job well done" in Los Angeles late on Saturday night. Despite this, the troops did not appear to have arrived in the city.

Early on Sunday the New York Times website quoted a federal official as saying that the force would arrive within 24 hours.

Trump criticised the city's Democratic governor and mayor in a post on his Truth Social platform, calling them "incompetent". He also said protesters would no longer be allowed to wear masks.

item.title: [ 64] *** PHILIPPINES TRAVEL ADVISORY THAT YOU WON'T HEAR ELSEWHERE ***
item.description:
Setting the Record Straight on the Zeitgeist of the Philippines

The Philippines is NO LONGER A TRAVEL DESTINATION FOR FINDING A WIFE (HASN'T BEEN) NOR IS IT GOOD FOR FUN.

I recently returned from a 4+ month long trip and I kept a journal of some of the events occurring there.

SOCIAL MEDIA HAS DESTROYED EVERY CORNER OF THE PHILIPPINES
without exception, every young Filipina is giving in to the temptation to ask for free money online if you try to meet them on a dating application/website. It is impossible to distinguish the really bad actors from the bad actors. They're all swapping notes about how to get the most from foreigners (and fellow Filipinos alike, they're not just doing these things to foreigners), and it has turned into a game of one-upsmanship between the girls to say how they got the most for doing the least. This is like western women going to a bar to see how many free drinks they can get.

Man-hate and feminism is FULL BORE now. I have videos of malls with huge displays up so that even the lowest IQ Filipinos can understand that women are being glorified.

I also have a video I took of just how many men women are messaging and what men are saying to them if anyone is interested in seeing it. A lot of men are simply genuinely seeking an emotional connection to a woman, however the women are happy to send you a few terse messages, letting you believe she's listening, then these dummies start sending her money for free. Some guys are offering thousands of dollars to travel for a month with her; sometimes it's multiple guys traveling with the same woman (this is disgusting, but it's happening). One big theme is that men seem to think because a woman is talking nicely to them that they're the only one talking to her - NOT THE CASE. The girl I am talking about was sleeping with 3-5 different men per day, and guys were treating her like she was some pure hearted gift.I will post this video eventually.

Original filename: it's more fucked in the philippines.jpg

item.title: [ 46] We are still going to have National Parks after this... right?
item.description:
>Superintendent of Crater Lake National Park resigns due to untenable role and downsizing of the National Park Service
>says that he believes it's not possible to sustain the park at this rate

https://www.kgw.com/article/news/local/southern-oregon/crater-lake-superintendent-resigns-over-trump-admin-staffing-cuts/283-065723b6-1e60-409e-8a9d-bf8359b448f9

>Heatley criticized what he described as a systemic effort to shrink the Park Service workforce, pointing to early retirement incentives for veteran employees, and terminations of newer staff without clear cause. He said policies initiated under the Trump administration continue to erode the agency’s ability to function.

>“We’re being told, for instance, when people leave, they only want to replace 25% of those permanent positions,” he said. “You can’t run an organization like that.”

We are still going to have the parks after this, r-right bros?

Original filename: 1920px-Above_Crater_Lake_(cropped).jpg

item.title: [ 45] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

Original filename: trv.png

item.title: [ 84] How important do you think a survival knife is? Do you think it is a rather no
item.description:
How important do you think a survival knife is?
Do you think it is a rather not needed item thats need can be superseded by a usual every day knife?
It is easier to just snap logs for a fire than to hack them with a survival knife.
This is of course not including raw survival where you are needing bushcraft and hunting skills to actually survive. Just general non normie tier camp holiday woodland camping.
